pr_title: DROOLS-5766 : Issue while using LocalDateTime field reference in GRE

timeline.message: DROOLS-5766 : Issue while using LocalDateTime field reference in GRE

timeline.bodyText: The fix was to remove this bound parameters check. I could not find a single unit test hitting this spot, but I know this was added before the GRE moved to DRL based save format. The "=" here is not needed.
timeline.author: Rikkola
